meanings.definition: The surgical procedure of making an incision into the colon.
meanings.sent1: During the colotomies, the doctors carefully cut into the colon to remove the blockage.
meanings.sent2: The hospital performed multiple colotomies last week to treat various colon issues.
meanings.sent3: At the medical conference, they joked that performing colotomies was like creating secret doors in the colon.
meanings.sent4: The colotomies were like pathways through the colon, allowing for easier access to the affected area.
meanings.sent5: The vivid image of the colotomies helped the students understand the surgical process better.
